snippet: A survey of the top articles of 2011 from The New York Times Travel section.
abstract: A survey of the top articles of 2011 from The New York Times Travel section.
lead_paragraph: Life on a giant cruise ship, dealing with canceled flights, an alternate route to Machu Picchu -- these are all subjects that attracted Web readers in 2011. As with last year's version, this year's list is topped by our annual Where to Go roundup. Other popular articles included spring weekend getaways, a different way to look at Paris and an essay on why we travel in unsettling times.
